Package it.unibz.readj2me.view

Class Summary
ConfigurationForm Form for viewing and editing the application's configuration.
ErrorAlert Alert to inform the user about an error.
FeedForm Form used to add a new feed.
FeedList List to show all feeds and also entry point for the user, so it contains other commands, i.e.
InputForm Abstract class used by all classes that require some input from the user.
NewsItemForm Form used to show a NewsItem's details
NewsItemList List that contains all NewsItems of a Feed and commands for ordering, updating the feed, ...
NewsItemSearchForm Form where the user can specify the search string for searching on news.
TagChoiceFilterForm Form where the user can select the tags to filter the news by.
TagChoiceForm Form where the user can select the desired tags.
TagForm Form where the user can select the desired tags.
TagList List containing all tags.
WarningAlert Alert to inform the user about warnings, i.e.
